message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR, cs.NE 

This paper deals with learning feature extractors and classifiers on 3D point clouds, which is a common problem in computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also proposes a new architectural design for graph-based learning, which falls under machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of Laplace-Beltrami operator and diffusion kernels is related to graph theory (cs.GR). Finally, the improvement in semantic classification suggests the use of neural networks (cs.NE).
